text: The Italian Stallion may refer to: == Film == * Nickname of Rocky Balboa, the fictional character in Rocky and its sequels * A 1970 low-budget film starring Sylvester Stallone in his first film role, originally titled The Party at Kitty and Stud's == Nickname or stage name == * Johnny Musso (born 1950), American football player * Bob Pisani, American television news correspondent * Gary Sabaugh (born 1957), American professional wrestler * Rocco Siffredi (born 1964), Italian porn actor * J.T. Smith (wrestler) (born 1967), American professional wrestler * Sylvester Stallone (born 1946), American actor, who played the character Rocky Balboa == See also == * List of Italian horse breeds * Stallion (disambiguation)
title: The Italian Stallion
